actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The ghast of Leng has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hp.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The ghast of Leng has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
special_abilities.desc: The ghast of Leng takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
